channel.title: Project Lexion 317
channel.description:
[CENTER]Welcome to Project Lexion! [u][b]Project Lexion[/b][/u] I started project lexion just today and, got pretty far. The server will have a good economy and no fast leveling, im using devlution 4.0 as the Base. [B]Client[/B] Im using, Deap 317 client as the base, i havent edited it yet but i will! Update protocol
Slayer Wilderness levels Perfect attack emotes Perfect pick up proper walking/running
[IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/8058/wilderness.png[/img] [IMG]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/2078/pickup.gif[/img]
